column1: Rationale:  Reduce the cost by use reversed instances 1 year period and reduce instance.
The first, Change ec2-instance service from 6 to, 4 instances and choose one-year reserve instances for the same instance type.
The second, Buy one-year reserve instances.
Don't use the VPN, I remove it.

column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
